properties.description: pipeline will bring the master Data from the one profile

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT a.AttributeValueDDObjectID as ID,
ltrim(rtrim(a.AttributeValueName)) as [NAME] ,
ltrim(rtrim(c.DataDictionaryObjectShortDesc)) as [Description] ,
ltrim(rtrim(g.AttributeValueName)) as [UtilizationEligibleIndicator] ,
ltrim(rtrim(e.AttributeValueName)) as [CustomerFacingIndicator] ,
ltrim(rtrim(d.AttributeValueName)) as [BillableIndicator] ,
ltrim(rtrim(f.AttributeValueName)) as [CategoryGroup] ,
a.BusinessEffectiveStartDate [EffectiveStartDate],
a.BusinessEffectiveEndDate [EffectiveEndDate]
FROM    dbo.TAXY01AttributeValue a 
JOIN dbo.TAXY01Attribute b ON b.AttributeDataDictionaryObjID = a.OwningAttributeDDObjectID
JOIN dbo.TAXY01DataDictionaryObject c ON c.DataDictionaryObjectID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID 
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT  a.AttributeValueName , c.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID 
FROM  dbo.TAXY01AttributeValue a 

JOIN dbo.TAXY01Attribute b ON b.AttributeDataDictionaryObjID = a.OwningAttributeDDObjectID 
JOIN dbo.TAXY01AttributeValueRltn c ON c.ParentAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID

WHERE   b.AttributeName = 'Labor Category Billable Indicator') d ON d.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID 

LEFT JOIN ( SELECT  a.AttributeValueName ,c.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID FROM    dbo.TAXY01AttributeValue a 
JOIN dbo.TAXY01Attribute b ON b.AttributeDataDictionaryObjID = a.OwningAttributeDDObjectID 
JOIN dbo.TAXY01AttributeValueRltn c ON c.ParentAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID 
WHERE   b.AttributeName = 'Labor Category Task Related Indicator') e ON e.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT  a.AttributeValueName ,
c.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID FROM    dbo.TAXY01AttributeValue a 

JOIN dbo.TAXY01Attribute b ON b.AttributeDataDictionaryObjID = a.OwningAttributeDDObjectID

JOIN dbo.TAXY01AttributeValueRltn c ON c.ParentAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID 
WHERE   b.AttributeName = 'Labor Category Group Name') f ON f.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID 
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT  a.AttributeValueName ,c.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID FROM    dbo.TAXY01AttributeValue a 
JOIN dbo.TAXY01Attribute b ON b.AttributeDataDictionaryObjID = a.OwningAttributeDDObjectID
JOIN dbo.TAXY01AttributeValueRltn c ON c.ParentAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID WHERE   b.AttributeName = 'Labor Category Utilization Eligible Indicator') g ON g.ChildAttributeValueDDObjID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID 
WHERE   AttributeName = 'Labor Category Name'

activities.name: isSourceExists
activities.description: Check for the existence of source

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  a.AttributeValueDDObjectID as ID,
		ltrim(rtrim(a.AttributeValueName)) as [NAME] ,
		ltrim(rtrim(c.DataDictionaryObjectShortDesc)) as [Description] ,
		a.AttributeValueEffectiveDate as [EffectiveStartDate], 
		c.DataDictionaryObExpirationDate as [EffectiveEndDate]
FROM    dbo.TAXY01AttributeValue a
		JOIN dbo.TAXY01Attribute b ON b.AttributeDataDictionaryObjID = a.OwningAttributeDDObjectID
		JOIN dbo.TAXY01DataDictionaryObject c ON c.DataDictionaryObjectID = a.AttributeValueDDObjectID
WHERE   AttributeName = 'Labor Entry Rejection Reason Name' OR AttributeName = 'Labor Entry Late Approval Reason Name' OR
		AttributeName = 'Labor Entry Late Submission Reason Name' OR AttributeName = 'Labor Entry Adjustment Reason Name'
